info.description: A list of the currently provided Interfaces to interact with FairOS decentralised file system(dfs), implementing user, pod, file system, key value store and document store
info.title: FairOS-dfs server

get.description: PublicPodGetDirHandler is the api handler to list content of a directory from a public pod
PodReceiveInfoHandler is the api handler to download file from a shared pod
get.summary: download file from a shared pod

get.description: PublicPodKVEntryGetHandler is the api handler to get key from key value store from a public pod
PublicPodFilePathHandler is the api handler to download file from a shared pod
get.summary: download file from a shared pod

post.description: DirectoryModeHandler is the api handler to change mode of a directory

get.description: DirectoryLsHandler is the api handler for listing the contents of a directory.

post.description: DirectoryMkdirHandler is the api handler to create a new directory.

get.description: DirectoryPresentHandler is the api handler which says if a directory is present or not

post.description: DirectoryRenameHandler is the api handler to rename a directory.

delete.description: DirectoryRmdirHandler is the api handler to remove a directory.

get.description: DirectoryStatHandler is the api handler which gives the information about a directory

post.description: DocCountHandler is the api handler to count the number of documents in a given document database
post.summary: Count number of document in a table

delete.description: DocDeleteHandler is the api handler to delete the given document database
DocEntryDelHandler is the api handler to delete a document from a document datastore
delete.summary: Delete a document from a document datastore

get.description: DocEntryGetHandler is the api handler to get a document from a document datastore
get.summary: Get a document from a document datastore

post.description: DocEntryPutHandler is the api handler add a document in to a document datastore
post.summary: Add a record in document datastore

get.description: DocFindHandler is the api handler to select rows from a given document datastore
get.summary: Get rows from a given doc datastore

parameters.description: expression to search for. allowed operators in expr are =, >, =>, <=, <. eg: 'first_name=>John', 'first_name=>J.', 'first_name=>.', 'age=>30', 'age<=30'. if index is string, expr supports regex. we do not have support for multiple conditions in expr yet
parameters.name: expr

post.description: DocIndexJsonHandler is the api handler to index a json file that is present in a pod, in to the given document database
post.summary: Index a json file that is present in a pod, in to the given document database

post.description: DocLoadJsonHandler is the api handler that indexes a json file that is present in the local file system
post.summary: Load json file from local file system

get.description: DocListHandler is the api handler which lists all the document database in a pod

post.description: DocCreateHandler is the api handler to create a new document database

parameters.description: doc table info. si or simple index is a comma separated list of keys and their types. eg: 'first_name=string,age=number'. valid index types can be 'string', 'number', 'map', 'list'. default index is 'id' and it should be of type string
parameters.name: doc_request

post.description: DocOpenHandler is the api handler to open a document database
FileModeHandler is the api handler to change mode of a file

delete.description: FileReceiveHandler is the api handler to delete a file from a given pod

get.description: FileDownloadHandlerGet is the api handler to download a file from a given pod

post.description: FileDownloadHandlerPost is the api handler to download a file from a given pod

get.description: FileReceiveHandler is the api handler to receive a file in a given pod
FileReceiveInfoHandler is the api handler to receive a file info

post.description: FileRenameHandler is the api handler to get the information of a file
FileShareHandler is the api handler to share a file from a given pod

get.description: FileStatHandler is the api handler to get the information of a file
FileStatusHandler is the api handler to check sync status of a file from a given pod

post.description: FileUpdateHandler is the api handler to update a file from a given offset
FileUploadHandler is the api handler to upload a file from a local file system to the dfs

parameters.description: block size to break the file
parameters.name: blockSize

parameters.description: overwrite the file if already exists
parameters.name: overwrite

post.description: GroupAcceptInviteHandler is the api handler to accept a group invite
GroupAddMemberHandler is the api handler to add a member to a group

parameters.description: group name, member name and permission
parameters.name: group_request

post.description: GroupCloseHandler is the api handler to close a group

delete.description: GroupDeleteHandler is the api handler to delete a new group
GroupDeleteSharedHandler is the api handler to delete a shared group

get.description: List groups
GroupGetMembers is the api handler to get the members of a group

post.description: GroupCreateHandler is the api handler to create a new group
GroupOpenHandler is the api handler to open a group

get.description: Get the permission of the user in the group
get.summary: Get the permission of the user in the group

post.description: GroupRemoveMemberHandler is the api handler to remove a member from a group
GroupUpdatePermissionHandler is the api handler to update a group permission

parameters.description: group name, member name and permission
parameters.name: group_request

post.description: KVCountHandler is the api handler to count the number of rows in a key value table
post.summary: Count rows in a key value table

delete.description: KVDeleteHandler is the api handler to delete a key value table
KVDelHandler is the api handler to delete a key and value from the kv table
delete.summary: Delete key-value from the kv table

get.description: KVGetHandler is the api handler to get a value from the kv table
get.summary: get value from the kv table

get.description: KVGetDataHandler is the api handler to get raw value from the kv table
get.summary: get value from the kv table

get.description: KVPresentHandler is the api handler to check if a value exists in the kv table
get.summary: Check if a value exists in the kv table

post.description: KVPutHandler is the api handler to put a key-value  in the kv table
post.summary: put key and value in the kv table

post.description: KVExportHandler is the api handler to export from a particular key with the given prefix
post.summary: Export from a particular key with the given prefix

post.description: KVLoadCSVHandler is the api handler to load a csv file as key and value in a KV table
post.summary: Upload a csv file in kv table

get.description: KVListHandler is the api handler to list all the key value tables in a pod

post.description: KVCreateHandler is the api handler to create a key value table
KVOpenHandler is the api handler to open a key value table
KVSeekHandler is the api handler to seek to a particular key with the given prefix
KVGetNextHandler is the api handler to get the key and value from the current seek position
post.summary: Get next value from last seek in kv table

post.description: PodCloseHandler is the api handler to close an open pod

delete.description: PodDeleteHandler is the api handler to delete a pod

post.description: PodForkHandler is the api handler to fork a pod
PodForkFromReferenceHandler is the api handler to fork a pod from a given sharing reference
post.summary: Fork a pod from sharing reference

get.description: PodListHandler is the api handler to list all pods

post.description: PodCreateHandler is the api handler to create a new pod
PodOpenHandler is the api handler to open pod
PodOpenAsyncHandler is the api handler to open pod asynchronously

get.description: PodPresentHandler is the api handler to check if a pod is present
PodReceiveHandler is the api handler to receive shared pod from shared reference

parameters.description: pod name to be saved as
parameters.name: sharedPodName

get.description: PodReceiveInfoHandler is the api handler to receive shared pod info from shared reference

post.description: PodShareHandler is the api handler to share a pod to the public

get.description: PodStatHandler is the api handler get information about a pod

post.description: PodSyncHandler is the api handler to sync a pod's content
PodSyncAsyncHandler is the api handler to sync a pod's content

get.description: Check if the given user is logged-in

post.description: logs-out user

get.description: show user stats

delete.summary: Delete user for ENS based authentication

post.description: login user with the new ENS based authentication

get.description: checks if the new user is present in the new ENS based authentication

post.description: registers new user with the new ENS based authentication
